title: Very slow league client
body: hi all, I recently installed the 8.20 patch and now my client doesnt want to work, it takes like 10 mins for the 'play' button to load up and it takes ages to put my friends on my friends lost into the right groups, the store doesnt load and gives me error 900. the client is and has never been this slow. any help will be great. I am on oce, my pc has 8gb of ram and a dedicated gefroce processor. help me as im close to diamond and this is making it hard to grind!

replies.body: Having similar issues here, client keeps crashing etc. Takes an age for it to respond to anything when you finally log in.

What ISP? 
There's an issue with Aussie Broadband currently it seems.

> [{quoted}](name=Dyslexic,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=1V4tLcoF,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-10-10T02:40:14.905+0000)
>
> What ISP? 
> There's an issue with Aussie Broadband currently it seems.

im on aussie broadband and having these issues, where did they announce this?

> [{quoted}](name=AP Trist,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=1V4tLcoF,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-10-10T03:00:29.980+0000)
>
> im on aussie broadband and having these issues, where did they announce this?

Aussie Broadband unofficial discord. It wasn't announced, but there's a lot of discussion about it. A riot employer (Mindstar) is in the discord now and it's being looked into further.
haha there must be a discord server for everything now, how odd. Good to hear its being looked into though.
habibis i'm also having the same problem and lost 3 LP cause of it, rito please fix {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}}
WAIT IT SEEMS LIKE ITS WORKIN AGAINN! YEEET
Having the same issue here, none of us in the house can login to league but internet is working perfectly otherwise.
Yup, same issue here. Trying to grind ranked but client keep glitching out. Happening since 8.20 patch.
